name: Untiled (WSC Big Brain Squad)
description:
Theme: Diversity & Inclusion

Our game was made with the intention to gather as many diverse groups as possible, utilising the colours of the rainbow and music. Music transcends the barriers of our society, allowing for groups to openly express thought, struggle and celebration - which has brought people together for hundreds of years. Our other focus was the colours of the rainbow. The rainbow has been used as many symbols, however, we decided that we would use it to celebrate the LGBTQ+ community and the NHS – that have kept us safe, and worked tirelessly doing so, over the COVID-19 pandemic.

How to Play:

WASD to move
Space to Jump

A Game By:

Fraser Fallows – Programmer
Jake Mills – Programmer
David Csontos – Music Producer
Benjamin Loft – Artist
